Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the castle guards' routes have major security vulnerabilities.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Prelude of Light#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Fire Temple# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Magic Beans#.
